Error 1723061617432 - "TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'email')"

-----

Error 1723064531234 - "error: select * from \"contact\" where \"deletedAt\" is null and (\"email\" = $1) union all select * from \"contact\" where \"deletedAt\" is null and \"linkedId\" = (select *) - SELECT * with no tables specified is not valid"

-----

Error 1723064720684 - "error: select * from \"contact\" where \"deletedAt\" is null and (\"email\" = $1) union all select * from \"contact\" where \"deletedAt\" is null and \"linkedId\" = (select *) - SELECT * with no tables specified is not valid"

-----

Error 1723065052981 - "error: select * from \"contact\" where \"deletedAt\" is null and (\"email\" = $1 or \"phoneNumber\" = $2) union all select * from \"contact\" where \"deletedAt\" is null and \"linkedId\" = (select \"id\" from \"contact\" where \"deletedAt\" is null and (\"email\" = $3 or \"phoneNumber\" = $4)) - more than one row returned by a subquery used as an expression"

-----

Error 1723065213570 - "UnexpectedLogicalError: Unexpected Error - Both Email and Phone number are null"
